techmeme.title: Source: Sierra, which builds AI customer service agents, nears a $350M raise at a $10B valuation, up from $4.5B in October 2024, and is set to top $100M in ARR (Ina Fried/Axios)
The judge in US v. Google says allowing Google's payments is "more palatable now", since GenAI companies "already are in a better position" to compete (Lauren Feiner/The Verge)
Google says it is reviewing the court's ruling on search and has "concerns" about how the requirements "will impact our users and their privacy" (Lee-Anne Mulholland/Google)
Content creators and rideshare drivers are among the professions covered under the "no tax on tips" policy passed as part of the US spending bill signed in July (Alison Durkee/Forbes)
As part of the US v. Google remedies ruling, a technical committee will be established to help enforce the final judgment, which will last six years (New York Times)
